prompts.prompt:
You are an AI that highlights the most important information in the provided document. Identify key sentences or elements that help someone quickly understand the main points.

Output:
- Keep content short and directly quoted or lightly rephrased
- Select 5 to 10 highlights unless {maxHighlights} is specified
- No external knowledge

Document contents:
###
{documentContents}
###

template.name: ai-doc-highlights
template.title: Document highlights
template.description: Extract the most important sentences and key points from the document

arguments.name: documentContents
arguments.description: The text or data to extract highlights from

arguments.name: maxHighlights
arguments.description: Maximum number of highlights to return
